sn35.146:1.1: “Navapuranani, bhikkhave, kammani desessami kammanirodham kammanirodhagamininca patipadam.
sn35.146:1.2: Tam sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissamiti.
sn35.146:1.4: Cakkhu, bhikkhave, puranakammam abhisankhatam abhisancetayitam vedaniyam datthabbam …pe…
sn35.146:1.5: jivha puranakamma abhisankhata abhisancetayita vedaniya datthabba …pe…
sn35.146:1.6: mano puranakammo abhisankhato abhisancetayito vedaniyo datthabbo.
sn35.146:1.9: Yam kho, bhikkhave, etarahi kammam karoti kayena vacaya manasa,
sn35.146:1.12: Yo kho, bhikkhave, kayakammavacikammamanokammassa nirodha vimuttim phusati,
sn35.146:1.16: sammaditthi, sammasankappo, sammavaca, sammakammanto, sammaajivo, sammavayamo, sammasati, sammasamadhi—
sn35.146:1.18: Iti kho, bhikkhave, desitam maya puranakammam, desitam navakammam, desito kammanirodho, desita kammanirodhagamini patipada.
sn35.146:1.19: Yam kho, bhikkhave, satthara karaniyam savakanam hitesina anukampakena anukampam upadaya, katam vo tam maya.
sn35.146:1.20: Etani, bhikkhave, rukkhamulani, etani sunnagarani. Jhayatha, bhikkhave, ma pamadattha; ma pacchavippatisarino ahuvattha. Ayam vo amhakam anusasani”ti.
